scripts.bundle:rename: cd build/static/assets && cp main.*.js main.js & cp runtime*.js runtime.js & cp 2.*chunk.js chunk.js
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:clean & npm run bundle:copy & npm run bundle:rename
scripts.deploy:s3: aws s3 sync build s3://spilt-milk-orders --acl public-read
scripts.deploy:s3:finished: yarn notify -t "S3 staging deployment finished" -m "Spilt milk orders"
scripts.deploy:s3:production: aws s3 sync build s3://spilt-milk-orders --acl public-read
scripts.deploy:s3:production:finished: yarn notify -t "S3 production deployment finished" -m "Trading block: Charts"
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run bundle && npm run deploy:s3 && npm run deploy:s3:finished
scripts.deploy:production: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run bundle && npm run deploy:s3:production && npm run deploy:s3:production:finished
